altTitles.ja: 転コロ

description.en: His grades are average. His physical fitness is average. But when it comes to games, high school student Mikagami​ Kouji is a battle-worn veteran. After being summoned to another world by a magic circle, he's given only the Copy skill, which is derided as useless trash in this world. Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner, Head Priestess Zayd, Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment, as despair turns to hope, this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!
description.es:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.
description.id: Siswa sekolah menengah Kouji Mikagami, memiliki nilai pelajaran biasa dan kemampuan atletik biasa, tapi "dia tidak banyak kalah" dalam bermain game, entah kenapa saat bermain game dia tiba-tiba dipanggil ke dunia lain. Sebuah cerita yang dimulai dengan apa yang terjadi. Meskipun mengkonsumsi 1.000 batu ajaib tingkat tinggi untuk melakukan pemanggilan, fakta bahwa ia hanya memiliki "Skill Copy" kemampuan terlemah membuat marah pendeta, dan akhirnya Mikagami dijadikan budak gladiator di Colosseum. Mikagami yang kesal dengan situasi yang tiba-tiba menyadari bahwa situasinya seperti dalam game, dan dengan kemampuan terlemahnya dia akan membuat budak harem di dunia lain.
description.es-la:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.en:
Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

---
**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3166015)
- Promotional video - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/YmCRdVGAOPk)
- Songs accompanying the chapters - [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoEbYVmn3Vy_q874VMUq41Q/video)

Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, overworked salaryman Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).
description.ja:
狐を拾ったら、嫁がれました。

三十路手前のサラリーマン、日野峰吾郎は、とある理由で嫁ぎ遅れた化け狐、こがねを助けたことで恩返しと称した求婚を迫られる。こがねを無下にすることもできず、吾郎は「1年間の同棲を経て妻として認められたら結婚する」という条件を提案することに。果たしてこがねは無事に嫁ぐことができるのか？

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

title.en: Drama na Koi wa Kihon kara

altTitles.ja: ドラマな恋は基本から

altTitles.ja-ro: Drama na Koi ha Kihon kara

altTitles.en: Dramatic Love Starts from the Basics

description.en: Shinji Yuuki is an ordinary businessman, 35 years old, single, no girlfriend, living at home. He is worried about his future as a single man, but he has little experience in love and is afraid of marriage activity. But when he meets a female  doctor, he falls in "love beyond his imagination," a love that turns his life upside down!
description.ja: 「35歳独身、彼女なし、実家暮らし」の平凡なサラリーマン・悠木慎史。独りで生きる未来に不安があるけれど、恋愛経験は少ないし婚活も怖い――。そんな悠木が、とあるアクシデントで医師・伴瑛理子と出会い、人生がひっくり返る「想像以上の恋」に落ちる！ 　大ヒット社会人恋愛漫画『この会社に好きな人がいます』の榎本あかまるが贈る、ミドサーから始める恋愛トレーニング!!
description.pt-br:
A vida de Shinji Yuuki dá uma guinada inesperada quando ele conhece uma médica, despertando um amor que desafia seus medos e incertezas. Seu mundo ordinário como empresário é jogado no caos, à medida que esse novo afeto o tira da zona de conforto e o obriga a enfrentar suas ansiedades mais profundas sobre relacionamentos e o futuro.

Há alguma direção específica que você gostaria que essa história tomasse, ou desafios particulares que Shinji possa enfrentar ao navegar por esse romance inesperado?

altTitles.ja: 願いのアストロ

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

title.en: Gōnglüè duìxiàng! Nǐ rén shè wāile a!

altTitles.zh: 攻略对象！你人设歪了啊！

description.en:
"Why won't you like me...gege?"
"Don't call me gege, it's disgusting."

......So I'm now in a dating sim with this non-romanceable target who looks just like my brother—— why does he keep pestering me?!

altTitles.ja: 今日もベランダで

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

description.en: Doujinshi Chinese from the Asgard saga from the anime Saint Seiya.

title.en: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.ja: センパイ！わざとじゃないんです！

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.en: Senpai! I Didn't Do It on Purpose!

description.en:
Sachi, a high school student, is confessed to by her love Jun, a senior who is a year older than her, and they are finally going out! However, as soon as she realizes that she is in love with Jun, Sachi has a constitution that causes her to have accidental pervert incidents with him every chance she gets! When Sachi tries to hold his hand for the first time, she accidentally puts her hand down his pants and she ends up deeply misunderstanding Jun when he asks her to pull out her hand. 

It's a sexy cute☆romantic comedy!
description.ja: 女子高生・幸は一学年上の憧れの先輩・純に告白されて、晴れて付き合えることに！ ところが両思いになった途端、幸は純に対して事あるごとにラッキースケベを起こしてしまう体質になってしまい…！? はじめて手を握ろうとしたら、勢いあまって彼のズボンに手を突っ込んでしまい違うものを握ってしまったり、あまつさえ手を抜こうとしたら手で抜こうとしてしまったりする、そんな一組のカップルが織りなすエロカワ☆ラブコメディです。
description.ru: Старшеклассница Сати наконец начинает встречаться с Дзюном, парнем который старше её на год. Она первая призналась, а теперь каждый раз, когда её переполняют чувства любви, богатые формы так и норовят создать неловкую ситуацию! Первая попытка Сати взяться за руки, случайно превращается в нырок в штаны Дзюна, оставляя его в полном недоумении. Встречайте эро-кавай ☆ лавком мангу!

altTitles.ja: ヤニねこ

description.en: A chain-smoking catgirl struggles with her cigarette addiction.

altTitles.ja: ピープ

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

title.en: Gyaru Maid to Akuyaku Reijou ~Ojou-sama no Happy End shika Katan!~

altTitles.ja: ギャルメイドと悪役令嬢 ～おじょーさまのハッピーエンドしか勝たん！～

altTitles.en: Gal Maid & Villainess: Only Milady's Happy End Will Win!

altTitles.pl: Modna Służka i Antagonistka: Liczy Się Tylko Pomyślność Mojej Pani!

description.en: A gyaru named Serina is reincarnated into the world of an otome game as a background character who is sold off by her family and now works as the exclusive maid of the game's villainess Almelia. Yuri romcom hijinks ensue.
description.ja: ギャルのセリナが転生したのは、オタクな友達に激推しされてハマった乙女ゲームの世界だった！モブキャラに転生していたセリナは親の借金のカタで売られ、悪役令嬢・アルメリアのもとでメイドをすることになるが…。
description.pl: Gyaru o imieniu Serina zostaje reinkarnowana w świecie gry otome jako postać drugoplanowa, która zostaje sprzedana przez swoją rodzinę i teraz pracuje jako ekskluzywna pokojówka złoczyńcy Almelii. Yuri romcom
description.pt-br: Uma gyaru chamada Serina é reencarnada no mundo de um Otome game (jogo de "namoro"), como uma personagem secundária que é vendida por sua família e agora trabalha como a empregada exclusiva da vilã do jogo, Almelia. Confusões românticas Yuri de forma hilariantes se desdobram.

altTitles.ja: 榎本先輩は天使なんかじゃない

altTitles.vi: Enomoto-senpai không phải là một thiên thần

description.en: In the room of Hagino (university student), there is a ghost (?) of a man who was supposed to have died in an accident. That is Enomoto. Enomoto is the best friend of a senior student whom Hagino has a crush on, and is a bold man with a mean look in his eyes. Like the Grim Reaper, Enomoto declares, "If I can take my best friend's life within 49 days, I can come back to life in his place." A BL story of secret nemeses between an egocentric freeloader and a doggy-like landlord!

title.en: I, The Invincible Villain Master With My Apprentices

altTitles.zh: 反派师尊的我带着徒弟们天下无敌

altTitles.tr: Ben, Çıraklarımla Birlikte Yenilmez Kötü Ustayım

altTitles.sv: Jag, den oövervinnelige elaka Mästaren och mina lärlingar

description.en: Shen Shi was very disappointed when he transmigrated into the book he wrote and didn't even end up as the protagonist. He also didn’t understand why the invincible hero became a girl? Even worse, why did all his apprentices want to become his wife instead! The protagonist asked him, “Master! Would you like to take me right now? Or do I have to kill off the other apprentices first before you'll have me?”
description.tr: Shen Shi çok üzgündü. Neden yazdığı kitaba gittiğini ve ana karakter olmadığını anlamadı. Ölümsüz erkek ana karakter neden kadındı? Daha bir çok şeyi anlamadı. Çırak yetişimcisi olmak istediği belliydi, bu yüzden herkes onun çırağı olmak istedi. Ana karakter: “Usta! Bugün önce beni mi yiyeceksin, yoksa bütün büyük kız kardeşleri öldürdükten sonra mı beni yemek istiyorsun?”
description.zh: 沈适感觉很难过。 他就不明白了，为什么穿越到了自己写的书里，还不是主角。 他也不明白，龙傲天男主角，为什么变成了女的？ 他更不明白，明明要养成的是徒弟，为什么一个个的都想上位当师娘？ 主角：“师父！你今天是要先吃我呢，还是我干掉所有师姐，你再吃我呢？”

description.en: A transfer student desperately seeking someone to relate to pursues the attention of a mysterious boy covered in bandages, thinking he might finally be able to build a friendship for the first time since a tragic accident.

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amou, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amou sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?

altTitles.ja: 龍とカメレオン

description.en:
Garyou Hanagami is a veteran mangaka. Best known for the behemoth of a series that is Dragon Land, Hanagami-sensei has years of experience under his belt and is always thinking up new manga ideas. 

Shinobu Miyama is not. An amateur working for Hanagami-sensei as an assistant, Miyama is nicknamed “The Chameleon” for his ability to copy the artstyles of those he works under. However, his true dream is to escape the faceless crowds and become someone. 

So what happens when a work accident causes them to swap bodies?
description.fr:
Garyou Hanagami est un mangaka chevronné. Il est connu pour son oeuvre Dragon Land, le manga le plus populaire. Hanagami a des années d'expérience à son actif et déborde d'une créativité et d'une énergie folle.

Shinobu Miyama est un dessinateur travaillant pour Hanagami en tant qu'assistant libre. Miyama est surnommé "le caméléon" en raison de sa capacité à copier le style de n'importe quel artiste à la perfection. Cependant, son véritable rêve est de sortir de la masse et de devenir quelqu'un avec une grande renommée.

Suite a un accident, les deux mangaka échangent de corps. Garyou va maintenant devoir battre sa propre oeuvre, dans le corps d'un illustre inconnu.
Une bataille au sommet du manga commence ! 
Entre le dragon qui repart de zéro et le caméléon qui tente d'imiter cet animal céleste ! 

Qui va remporter le titre du meilleur mangaka ?!

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

title.en: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin

altTitles.ja-ro: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin

altTitles.fr: La mauvaise façon d'utiliser la magie de soin

altTitles.zh: 治愈魔法的错误使用方法

altTitles.ja: 治癒魔法の間違った使い方 ～戦場を駆ける回復要員～

altTitles.zh-hk: 治癒魔法的錯誤使用法～奔赴戰場的治療人員～

altTitles.en: The Wrong Way to Use Healing Magic

altTitles.pt-br: O jeito errado de usar magia de cura

description.en:
Usato, an ordinary high schooler, happens to run into two fellow students after school one rainy day. Suddenly, all three of them are engulfed in a magic circle and transported to a fantasy world. There’s just one tiny problem — Usato is simply dragged along by accident!  On top of that, Usato learns that he is capable of using healing magic — an incredibly rare affinity in this new world.

Now Usato must spend his days with the rescue team thugs, struggling through their hellish training regimen — learning the wrong way to use healing magic.

Get ready for an eccentric otherworld fantasy filled with comedy and combat!
description.ja:
**最前線を駆けるのは、常識破りの回復要員！？**

平凡な高校生のウサトは、同じ学校のスズネ、カズキと共に異世界へと転移してしまう。 三人は魔王軍から王国を救うための『勇者』として喚び出された――が、 勇者としての適性を持つのはスズネとカズキだけ。ウサトはただ巻き込まれただけだった！ しかし、ウサトにレア属性の『治癒魔法使い』の素養が見つかったことで事態は一変し…！？ 「小説家になろう」発！　ギャグありバトルありのドタバタ異世界ファンタジー！
description.pt: Usato Ken é um estudante normal do segundo ano do ensino médio. Em um certo dia chuvoso, as duas pessoas mais admiradas do conselho estudantil, Inukami Suzune e Ryuusen Kazuki, percebem que ele não tem um guarda-chuva, então Kazuki empresta o seu para ele. Depois eles acabam conversando enquanto vão embora juntos, mas de repente são convocados para outro mundo como heróis. Parece que Ken foi arrastado pela invocação por acaso, mas ele não pode voltar para a Terra. O que ele fará? Será que vai chorar pelo cantos ou vai agir?
description.ru: Одним дождливым осенним днём жизнь абсолютно заурядного ученика старшей школы Усато Кена перевернулась с ног на голову: вместе с двумя членами школьного совета – президентом Инуками Судзунэ и вице-президентом Рюунзэном Кадзуки Усато-куна призвали в другой мир! После проверки магических способностей наш герой оказывается целителем и попадает в отряд спасателей, командир которого отличается крайне нестандартными методами подготовки…
description.pt-br: Usato Ken é um estudante normal do segundo ano do ensino médio. Em um certo dia chuvoso, as duas pessoas mais admiradas do conselho estudantil, Inukami Suzune e Ryuusen Kazuki, percebem que ele não tem um guarda-chuva, então Kazuki empresta o seu para ele. Depois eles acabam conversando enquanto vão embora juntos, mas de repente são convocados para outro mundo como heróis. Parece que Ken foi arrastado pela invocação por acaso, mas ele não pode voltar para a Terra. O que ele fará? Será que vai chorar pelo cantos ou vai agir?

altTitles.zh-ro: Hu Ru Yi Ye Bing Jiao

description.en: Yu Xiang unfortunately transmigrates into a merchant's daughter, who was mistakenly taken to the marquis manor at birth. She is immediately disabled, and carries the nickname of 'disaster star'. Helplessly, she can only cling to her older brother, the marquis, in hopes of surviving, and wait for the true master to return so she can give way. Years later, when the true master returns to the manor, Yu Xiang prepares to leave. however, she finds out her clinging technique is too good, that her marquis brother won't let her leave!
description.fr:
Yu Xiang donne, handicapée, échange son coeur avec celui de son frère. 
Après sa mort, elle se réincarne dans le corps d'une fille qui porte le même nom, est paralysée comme elle et qui est surnommée l'étoile malchanceuse. 
Yu Xiang réalise alors qu'elle est dans le roman qu'elle lisait avant de mourir. Synopsis du roman en question : Yu Xiang, fille de marchand a été échangée à la naissance avec la fille d'un Seigneur.
description.zh: 虞襄很不幸穿成了被抱到侯府的商家女，一来就双腿残废，脑袋上还顶着个‘丧门星’的称号。 无奈之下只得牢牢抱住侯爷哥哥的大腿，先把日子混下去，等正主儿回来就麻溜的让位。 几年之后正主儿回归，虞襄包袱款款准备走人，却发现抱大腿的技术太专业，侯爷哥哥不让走了！

title.en: The Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf

altTitles.en: Max-Level Green Tea Transmigrates Into Little Pitiful One

altTitles.zh-ro: Man Ji Lvcha Chuan Cheng Xiao Kelian
Mǎn Jí Lǜchá Chuān Chéng Xiǎo Kělián

altTitles.en: Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf

description.en:
Lin Feilu is an oscar-winning actress. Acting cute, slandering, feigning innocence, or playing the white lotus. Regardless, she wasn't a good person. She then died on her 27th birthday. She vowed, if there was a next life, she would be a good person. In the end, she transmigrated into a five-year-old princess of the great Lin Dynasty. Her imperial mother was not favored, her older brother was mentally challenged, and her life was constantly in danger, with having little to eat and trying to stay warm.

Lin Feilu: …You all forced me!
description.fr:
Lin Feilu est une actrice oscarisée. Faire la mignonne, médire, feindre l'innocence ou jouer les innocentes. Peu importe, elle n’est pas quelqu'un de bien. Elle meurt le jour de son 27e anniversaire en se jurant que si elle a une prochaine vie, elle serait une bonne personne. Elle se réincarne en une princesse de cinq ans de la grande dynastie Dalin. Sa mère, concubine impériale n'était pas favorisée parce son frère aîné souffrait d'une déficience mentale.
Lin Feilu, bien que déterminée à rester une bonne personne, va utiliser ses talents de manipulatrice pour retourner la situation de sa famille.

title.en: Shin no Jitsuryoku wa Girigiri Made Kakushite Iyou to Omou

altTitles.en: I Think I'll Hide My True Ability to the Last Moment

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin no Jitsuryoku wa Girigiri Made Kakushiteiyou to Omou

altTitles.ru: Я думаю скрывать свои истинные способности до последнего момента

altTitles.ja: 真の実力はギリギリまで隠していようと思う

altTitles.zh-hk: 我想將真正的實力隱藏到極限

altTitles.pt-br: Acho Que Vou Esconder Minha Verdadeira Habilidade Até O Último Momento

altTitles.fr: Je vais garder mes véritables capacités secrètes jusqu'à la dernière minute.

description.en:
A world where you can form a pact with gods and gain skills. Born as the third son of a famous knight family, Yuno was so busy controlling his innate power that he was eventually called "incompetent.".
However, in the magical knight academy, where he was enrolled for some reason, he fulfilled his fateful encounter with an unnamed god who was despised as "incompetent" like himself..  
Yuno, who formed a pact with the goddess and named her [Athena], secretly decided to make her the highest god, and decided to get a little more serious.
description.fr: Un monde où l'on peut conclure un pacte avec les dieux et acquérir des compétences. Troisième fils d'une célèbre famille de chevaliers, Yuno était tellement occupé à contrôler son pouvoir inné qu'il a fini par être qualifié d'"incompétent"... Cependant, à l'académie des chevaliers magiques, où il était inscrit pour une raison quelconque, il a fait la rencontre fatidique d'un dieu sans nom qui était méprisé pour son "incompétence"...  Yuno, qui a conclu un pacte avec la déesse et l'a nommée [Athéna], a secrètement décidé de faire d'elle le dieu suprême, et a décidé d'être un peu plus sérieuse.
description.id:
Dunia di mana kau dapat membuat kontrak dengan dewa dan memperoleh skill. Terlahir sebagai putra ketiga dari keluarga ksatria terkenal, Yuno begitu sibuk mengendalikan kekuatan bawaannya sehingga dia akhirnya disebut sebagai "tidak kompeten".  
Tapi, di akademi ksatria sihir, dia terdaftar karena suatu alasan, dia bertemu dengan dewa yang dipandang rendah sebagai "tidak kompeten" seperti dirinya ..  
Yuno, yang membuat kontrak dengan dewa dan menamainya [Athena], diam-diam memutuskan untuk menjadikannya dewa tertinggi, dan memutuskan untuk menjadi sedikit lebih serius.
description.pt-br: Um mundo onde você pode fazer um contrato com Deus e ganhar habilidades. Nascido como o terceiro filho de uma famosa família de cavaleiros, Yuno estava tão ocupado controlando seu poder inato que acabou sendo chamado de "incompetente".No entanto, na academia do cavaleiro mágico, que foi matriculado por algum motivo, ele cumpriu seu encontro fatídico com um deus sem nome que era desprezado como "incompetente" como ele.Yuno, que fez um contrato com a deusa e a chamou de [Athena], secretamente decidiu torná-la a deusa suprema e decidiu levar um pouco mais a sério seu destino.

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

description.en:
Hwang Cho-min has been violently bullied since middle school. But when his estranged brother suddenly dies in a motorcycle accident, Cho-min finds out he was the leader of Imperial Gang, a huge gang. 

Now in possession of his brother's phone, Cho-min seizes this chance to get revenge on his high school bullies by ordering his brother's underlings to beat them up. But the King Game begins when his brother's girlfriend shows up and threatens to expose him unless he cooperates in taking down a rival gang. 

With his life now on the line, can Cho-min manage to continue this farce?

altTitles.ja: 彼岸島 最後の47日間

altTitles.th: เกาะกระหายเลือด - 47วันสุดท้ายสู่หายนะ

description.en:
This is a continuation of the story of Higanjima : featuring an isolated island, inhabited by warring vampires and humans, and surrounded by aquatic demons that foil any attempts at entry or escape that are not explicitly authorised by their vampiric overlord , Miyabi.   
  
Ryousuke, his girlfriend Kazumi, and his friend Yamaoka are shipwrecked by the demons, and wash up on the shore of Higanjima. They soon experience the monstrous cruelty of the island's vampires first-hand but, luckily, Ryousuke is able to join up with the human resistance.   
  
His only desire is to leave Higanjima…however, mainland Japan may not be safe for long either. If the vampiric threat is not eradicated in 47 days, then Miyabi's machinations will transform it into yet another vampire island!
description.fr:
Akira et la résistance humaine sont parvenus à conquérir le temple fortifié où résidait Miyabi. Alors que les derniers survivants profitent d'un repos de quelques jours bien mérité, un groupe d'étudiants échoue sur l'île d'Higanjima après avoir été attaqué par les démons marins. Ryosuke, Kasumi et Yamaoka vont très rapidement découvrir la cruauté sans limite des vampires.  
  
Miyabi, de son côté, ne compte pas en rester là et se prépare à attaquer le Japon directement grâce au nouveau moyen qu'il a trouvé pour vamprisier un maximum d'humain en un temps record. Son plan nécessite cependant 47 jours avant de pouvoir être mis en oeuvre.

title.en: Fuguushoku "Kanteishi" ga Jitsu wa Saikyou Datta: Naraku de Kitaeta Saikyou no "Shingan" de Musou suru

altTitles.en: Even Given the Worthless "Appraiser" Class, I'm Actually the Strongest - Unsurpassed with the Strongest [Divine Eye] Trained in the Abyss

altTitles.ja: 不遇職【鑑定士】が実は最強だった　～奈落で鍛えた最強の【神眼】で無双する～

altTitles.en: The Unfavourable Job [Appraiser] Is Actually the Strongest ~ Unsurpassed With the Strongest [God’s Eye] That Was Trained in the Abyss

altTitles.pt-br: Mesmo tendo a classe de "Avaliador" sem valor, sou na verdade o mais forte - Insuperável com o [Olho Divino] mais forte treinado no Abismo

description.en:
In a world where [Jobs] are god-given from birth, heroes are born, not made... and Ein’s job of [Appraiser] has put him about as far from the hero pedestal as possible.

Used, abused, and eventually abandoned by his fellow adventurers, Ein decides it just isn’t worth going on... Lucky for Ein, though, the end may just be the beginning... and a new lease on life. 

Turns out, his “worthless” job may just be the key to becoming a hero after all…


---

**Links:**
- [Web Novel (Japanese)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5242fx)
description.pt-br: Em um mundo onde [Jobs] são dados por Deus desde o nascimento, os heróis nascem, não são feitos... e o trabalho de [Avaliador] de Ein o colocou o mais longe possível do pedestal do herói. Usado, abusado e eventualmente abandonado por seus companheiros aventureiros, Ein decide que não vale a pena continuar... Para sorte de Ein, porém, o fim pode ser apenas o começo... e um novo sopro de vida. Acontece que seu trabalho “inútil” pode ser apenas a chave para se tornar um herói, afinal…

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...

altTitles.ja: 呪術廻戦

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

description.en:
Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
 Brought to you by mmk of 'Love Comedy Quest,' this is a pure love short comedy of the new era about 'neighbors'!

altTitles.ja: シグルイ

description.en:
At the beginning of the Edo period (1603-1868), when people enjoyed a time of peace, Lord Tokugawa Tadanaga decides to hold a fighting tournament. In the past, matches were fought with wooden swords, but this time real swords will be used. The one-armed Fujiki Gennosuke and the blind Irako Seigen will fight each other in this tournament, even though both of them are disciples of Iwamoto Kogan — known as Japan's greatest swordsman. So begins the story of intertwining fates, conflict, and strange destinies.  
  
Note:  
It's SHOUNEN because it's published in Champion Red, a shounen magazine for late teens+early 20ies

title.en: Elf Dorei to Kizuku Dungeon Harem - Isekai de Netotte Nakama o Fuyashimasu

altTitles.ja: エルフ奴隷と築くダンジョンハーレム ―異世界で寝取って仲間を増やします―

altTitles.en: A dungeon harem to build with elf-slaves - I'm going to sleep with them in another world and make more friends...
Dungeon Harem Made With Elf Slaves

description.en: Mars, a boy who was reincarnated in another world, travels with the Elf slave, Lilia. His goal is to conquer the world's main dungeon and obtain a "forbidden magic book" that has powers beyond common sense. But...since he fucked with Lilia every day, his conquests tended to be delayed.
description.id: Mars, seorang anak laki-laki yang bereinkarnasi di dunia lain, bepergian dengan budak Elf, Lilia.Tujuannya adalah untuk menaklukan dungeon utama dunia dan mendapatkan "buku sihir terlarang" yang memiliki kekuatan di luar akal sehat.  Tapi...karena dia ngentot dengan Lilia setiap hari, penaklukannya cenderung tertunda.

altTitles.ja: メイドインアビス

description.en:
The enormous cave system, known as the Abyss, is the last unexplored place in the world. Nobody knows how deep down goes this titanic pit, inhabited by strange and wondrous creatures and full of mysterious ancient relics which purpose in unknown to modern man. Generations of bold adventurers have been drawn by the cryptic depths of the Abyss. In course of time those brave enough to explore the dangerous pit came to be known as "Delvers."  
  
In Orth, the town at the edge of the Abyss, there lives a little orphan named Riko, who dreams of becoming as great a delver as her mother was and solving the great mystery of the pit. One day, exploring the murky depths, she stumbles upon a little boy who turns out to be a robot…
description.ja:
隅々まで探索されつくした世界に、唯一残された秘境の大穴『アビス』。どこまで続くとも知れない深く巨大なその縦穴には、奇妙奇怪な生物たちが生息し、今の人類では作りえない貴重な遺物が眠っている。
「アビス」の不可思議に満ちた姿は人々を魅了し、冒険へと駆り立てた。そうして幾度も大穴に挑戦する冒険者たちは、次第に『探窟家』呼ばれるようになっていった。

アビスの縁に築かれた街『オース』に暮らす孤児のリコは、いつか母のような偉大な探窟家になり、アビスの謎を解き明かすことを夢見ていた。そんなある日、リコはアビスを探窟中に、少年の姿をしたロボットを拾い…？
description.ka: უზარმაზარი გამოქვაბულების სისტემა, რომელიც ცნობილია როგორც უფსკრული, არის ბოლო შეუსწავლელი ადგილი მსოფლიოში. არავინ იცის, რამდენად ღრმად მიდის ეს ტიტანური ორმო, დასახლებული უცნაური და გასაოცარი არსებებით და სავსე იდუმალი უძველესი რელიქვიებით, რომელთა დანიშნულება თანამედროვე ადამიანისთვის უცნობია. თამამი ავანტიურისტთა თაობები მიზიდული იქნა უფსკრულის იდუმალი სიღრმეებით. დროთა განმავლობაში მათ, ვინც საკმარისად გაბედულები გამოიკვლიეს სახიფათო ორმო, გახდნენ ცნობილი როგორც "დელვერები". ორთში, უფსკრულის პირას მდებარე ქალაქში, ცხოვრობს პატარა ობოლი, სახელად რიკო, რომელიც ოცნებობს გახდეს ისეთივე დიდი დელვერი, როგორც დედამისი იყო და ამოხსნას ორმოს დიდი საიდუმლო. ერთ დღეს, ბუნდოვანი სიღრმეების შესწავლისას, ის წააწყდება პატარა ბიჭს, რომელიც აღმოჩნდება, რომ რობოტია…
description.ru: Огромная пещерная система, известная как Бездна, является последним неисследованным местом в мире. В этой титанической яме обитают странные и удивительные существа. Она полна таинственных древних реликвий, предназначение которых неизвестно современному человеку. Поколения смелых авантюристов были затянуты загадочными глубинами Бездны. Со временем достаточно храбрые, чтобы исследовать опасную яму, стали известны как «Исследователи Бездны». В Оосу, городе на краю Бездны, живет маленькая сирота по имени Рико, которая мечтает стать великим пещерным налетчиком, каким была ее мать, и разгадать великую тайну ямы. Однажды, исследуя темные глубины, она натыкается на маленького мальчика, который оказывается роботом...
description.es-la: El enorme sistema de cuevas, conocido como El Abismo, es el último lugar inexplorado en el mundo. Nadie sabe que tan profundo es este agujero titánico, habitado por extrañas y maravillosas criaturas y lleno de misterio y reliquias antiguas de propósito desconocido para la humanidad. Generaciones de valientes aventureros han sido atraídos a las profundidades cripticas del Abismo. Con el paso del tiempo estos exploradores son conocidos como "Exploradores de las Profundidades". En Oath, el pueblo al borde del Abismo, vive una pequeña niña huérfana llamada Riko, que sueña con convertirse en una gran exploradora como su madre y descubrir los misterios del Abismo. Un día explorando las obscuras profundidades se encuentra con un niño, que resulta ser un robot...

description.en:
Is the worst first meeting the best start to a love story?
On the day of her high school entrance ceremony, Hodaka, who has repeatedly moved and transferred schools due to her father's job, runs into a hard-to-approach boy wearing the same high school uniform at her front door. When they get on the elevator together, the worst thing happens...

altTitles.id: Level Up-ku aneh!  ~ Reinkarnasi Manusia Hebat di Dunia lain

description.en:
Zarmen, an adventurer who can't level up decides to retire from the adventurer business. Furthermore, in order to graduate from virginity, he decided to splurge on all the assets that he had diligently saved up since his reincarnation at a high-class brothel.

The woman who appeared in front of him was the finest woman he would ever have known. Thanks to her hospitality, Zarmen fully enjoys his first time, but at that moment, his ears hear a mysterious announcement...

[Impregnation confirmed.]
[Level up!]

"Does this mean that the more 'seeding' I do, the stronger I get?"

An extraordinary implantable foreign world adventure fantasy created by a bottom adventurer who has been at level 1 for many years levels up through sex!
description.id: Petualang "Zarmen" yang tidak bisa marah memutuskan untuk pensiun dari bisnis petualangan.  Selain itu, karena belum lulus dari keperawanan, dia memutuskan untuk membelanjakan semua kekayaan yang telah dia kumpulkan sejak dia bereinkarnasi di rumah bordil mewah.  Apa yang muncul di depannya adalah seorang wanita luar biasa yang tampaknya tidak memiliki hubungan selama sisa hidupnya.  Berkat keramahannya, Zarmen sepenuhnya menikmati seks pertamanya, tetapi pada saat dia berada dipuncaknya, sebuah pengumuman misterius muncul "Level up!" Terdengar di telinganya!  Ini adalah sebuah fantasi petualangan yang aneh dimana petualang terbawah level 1 selama bertahun-tahun tumbuh melalui segs.
description.ja:
うだつの上がらない冒険者“ザルメン”は、冒険業からの引退を決意。さらに童貞も卒業するため、転生してから今までせっせと貯めてきた全財産を高級娼館でひと思いに散財することにした。
そんな彼の前に現れたのは、彼には一生縁のなさそうな極上の女。彼女のもてなしもあり、ザルメンは初めてのセックスを十分に堪能するが、イッた瞬間、彼の耳には「着床を確認しました。レベルアップ！」という謎のアナウンスが！
「これってもしかして、“種付け”するほど強くなるってこと…？」
万年レベル1だった底辺冒険者がセックスを通して成り上がる、奇想天外な着床系異世界冒険ファンタジー！

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya no Boku ni Batsu Game ni Kokuhaku Shitekita Hazu no Gyaru ga, Doumitemo Boku ni Betahore Desu

description.en:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---
**Links:**
- Official Video Manga - [YouTube](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIUZdlu7xyxLAv956kN32dP6) (Chapters 1-3, With voice acting)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/an-introvert-s-hookup-hiccups)
description.ja:
**陰キャ×清楚ギャル、罰ゲームから始まるピュアラブコメ!!**

クラス内カーストトップの清楚ギャル・茨戸七海に罰ゲームで告白されて付き合うことになった陰キャ男子・簾舞陽信。 しかし罰ゲームのはずが、七海は陽信にガチ惚れしているようで…？
description.pl: Kiedy piękna Nanami Barato wyznaje miłość Yoshinowi Misumai, wydaje się to zbyt piękne, by mogło być prawdziwe! Tylko, że tak jest - i Yoshin o tym wie. Jak taki introwertyczny facet jak on ma zachować zimną krew, skoro wie, że to tylko wyzwanie? Jeszcze bardziej zastanawiające jest to, że pomimo jej krzykliwego wyglądu, ta rzekoma gyaru nie jest tak dobra w kontaktach z facetami! Być może jest to idealna okazja dla tego nieśmiałego faceta, aby zebrać się na odwagę i powiedzieć "tak" tej nieśmiałej dziewczynie. Tak zaczyna się ich nowe, wygodne życie porannych spotkań i ręcznie robionych lunchów. Rzecz w tym, że sądząc po jej zachowaniu, Nanami zakochała się w nim po uszy! Czy ta dwójka może odkryć swoje uczucia, a może nawet zakochać się w sobie - tym razem naprawdę?!
description.pt-br: Barato Nanami, uma versão atenuada da garota no topo da hierarquia da escola, perdeu um jogo de cartas e agora tem que confessar a um cara de sua classe como punição. Misumai Youshin, que é um solitário sem amigos, foi o cara escolhido, mas ele sabe da punição! Deveria ter sido uma punição do jogo, mas será que Nanami vai desenvolver sentimentos por Youshin…?

description.en: The erotic-comedy fantasy begins with a gentleman uncle who brings justice while doing some consensual seeding here and there.
description.es:
Un hombre que había muerto en soledad pidió a la diosa Nike que lo reencarnara en una «versión variante de un Tanetsuke Ojisan» y se reencarnó con el nombre de Genji.
Nike es convertida en la pollita 'Pinoko' como acompañante por su jefa, la diosa, y tiene que trabajar con Genji.
Tras reencarnarse, Genji confiesa su amor a Cindy, la recepcionista del gremio, pero ella le rechaza, diciendo que le gustan los hombres fuertes. Entonces Genji se marcha a derrotar al dragon negro más fuerte que se rumorea en el gremio.
La comedia erótica de fantasía de un tío con buen corazón que ayuda a los débiles, aplasta a los fuertes y protege a la mujer que le gusta!

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

description.en: Join gyaru Sakura Hibiki and ojou Souryuuin Akemi as they lift weights and exercise with the help of macho-man Machio! Learn for yourself how good form, good diet and plenty of exercise will help with healthy living!! Let's muscle!!!
description.ja:
「ひびき…お前、また太った？」

“食べること”が大好きな女子高生紗倉ひびきは友人の一言をきっかけにダイエットを始めようと決意する！！運動を一人では続けられない彼女が入会したのはスポーツジム！！そのジムで同級生でお嬢様の奏流院朱美と出会うのだが…！！
description.ru: Сакура Хибики - обычная старшеклассница, любящая покушать. Однажды ее подруга замечает, что Хибики поднабрала вес. Огорченная сим фактом, девушка пытается похудеть самостоятельно, но безуспешно. Решив раскошелиться ради великой цели, она направляется в спортзал, где встречает Мисс совершенство, по совместительству президента студсовета своей школы, Сорюин Акэми (у которой, как оказалось, есть небольшая странность). Теперь им вместе предстоит заниматься совершенствованием своих тел под надзором красавчика-тренера Матио.

altTitles.en: Different World Adventures Of A Lone Japan Ground Self Defense Force Ensign

altTitles.ja: ぼっち自衛官の異世界奮戦記

description.en: Jinguji Jo, an officer candidate of the Self-Defense Force, who had just graduated from the University of Defense, was reincarnated into a different world due to a traffic accident. The inventory had the standard equipment of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force! Jinguji Jo's self-defense officer battle action makes him unrivaled in the fantasy world with equipment stronger than magic!!
description.ja: 防大を卒業したばかりの自衛隊幹部候補生・神宮司丈は交通事故により異世界へ転生。インベントリーにはなんと陸上自衛隊標準装備品が揃っていた！　ファンタジー世界を魔法よりも強い装備で無双するジングージ・ジョーの自衛官バトルアクション！！
description.pt-br: Jinguji Jo, um candidato à Força de Autodefesa, que acabou de se formar, reencarnou em um mundo diferente por causa de um acidente no trânsito. Jinguji Jo ganha a habilidade "inventário", onde permite guardar qualquer coisa, assim ele percebe que seu equipamento da força de autodefesa está lá. A ação de Jinguji Jo neste novo mundo é imprescindível, combatendo criaturas fantasiosas com equipamentos mais poderosos que a própria magia!!!

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   
"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   
The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…  


---

altTitles.ja: シンコンクエスト 魔王の娘は真面目勇者を堕としたい

description.en:
Harold is the descendant of the hero who defeated the evil demon king. In this peaceful era, Harold has become a convenient handyman for the townsfolk.

One day, a sacred book predicting the world's destruction is discovered. The condition to avert this catastrophe is... "you must complete the 'Newlyweds Quest' with the demon king's daughter." Thus begins Harold's unexpected married life with Yona, the demon king's daughter.

While Harold still feels bewildered by all this, not only can Yona perfectly handle the household chores, she sweetly pampers him when he's tired. However, she harbors a secret...

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について
お隣遊び

altTitles.en: The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.pl: Opowieść o Tym, Jak Piękna Uczennica Zza Granicy Mieszkająca Po Sąsziedzku Zaczęła Odwiedzać Mnie W Domu, Po Tym Jak Pomogłem Zagubionej Małej Dziewczynce

altTitles.pt-br: A História de como Uma Linda Estudante Estrangeira que Mora ao Lado Começou a Visitar Minha Casa Depois que Ajudei Uma Menininha Perdida

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

altTitles.es: La situación de los vampiros en la casa de Hiiragi

altTitles.ja: 柊さんちの吸血事情

altTitles.es-la: Todos los días con una familia de vampiros
Las circunstancias de beber sangre de la familia Hiiragi

description.en: Every family has its own "secrets"... Shota Minamoto, a junior high school student, lives in an orphanage. One day, he is taken in by a family who lives in a gorgeous Japanese style mansion. Shota is welcomed with open arms, but the family has a secret that must not be revealed to the world.
description.ru:
У каждой семьи есть "секрет".
Минамото Сёта - ученик средней школы, живущий в детском доме. Однажды его решает приютить семья, живущая в богатом доме, где ему оказывают радушный прием. Но у них оказался "секрет" который не следует раскрывать всему миру.
description.es-la: Minamoto Shouta, un huérfano de 14 años que inesperadamente es adoptado por una familia adinerada, lo que él no sabía es que esta familia esconde un gran secreto. Una nueva comedia romántica de la autora de «A Couple of Cuckoos» Miki Yoshikawa.
description.pt-br: Cada família tem seus próprios "segredos"... Shouta Minamoto, um estudante do ensino médio, vive em um orfanato. Um dia, ele é adotado por uma família que mora em uma linda mansão em estilo japonês. Shouta é recebido de braços abertos, mas a família guarda um segredo que não deve ser revelado ao mundo.
